Entries.PeiMingHouse.000: {{Random: Hoho, coming to see me at this time?$3 && Back in my day, I used to have a palace.#$e# So if I have to be honest, this shack here is a large downgrade.$2 |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingHouse.001: {{Random: Some green tea to start such a gloomy morning is always a treat. && Rain, huh? Luckily, it doesn't seem like this place will be affected by droughts anytime soon. && Did you know that where I come from, there were Gods controlling the elements? #$b# Seeing that rain outside reminded me of someone.|inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingHouse.002: {{Random: Being a Martial God won't be of much use here, I suppose. So I tried picking up a new hobby. && Have you ever attempted writing poetry? Turns out this is hardly my field of expertise. |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingHouse.003: {{Random: To what do I owe the pleasure to see you here in this weather?$1#$e# Would you like some tea to warm up? I just brewed a whole pot.$6  && %Pei Ming looks relaxed.#$e# @! Fancy to see you in my abode again.$1#$b# Me? Oh, I simply enjoy the weather. It reminds me of my homeland.$6 |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingHouse.004: {{Random: Well, the weather can't be THAT bad if you made an effort to visit me today, @! Hoho! $9 && Do you have too much time in the winter, or are you just bored enough to come and see me so often?#$b# Not that I mind, heh.$3 && $y Do you grow anything on your farm this season?_Yes, I do._Hoho! Mortals' adaptability is truly fascinating to me.$1_No._That's a pity. I guess tending to animals is the way to go for you during the winter, hm? |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingRainyOutdoor.000: {{Random: I actually don't mind being outside in the rain. && Hello. Why don't you stay and enjoy the rain with me for a while? #$e# We can go back to my place afterwards.$3 && .........(Pei Ming glances at you with a weird stare.)$2 #$b# HAHAHAHA! Farmer, you look so very funny all drenched from the rain. A sight to behold.$6 && I wonder if I should pick up fishing?|inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingMines.000: {{Random: I tend to get bored here so I went to check the mines.#$e# The monsters are still too weak here, so my boredom did not get resolved.$7 && I flung a stone crab onto a slime and it just exploded.#$b# The slime, I mean. && I find these mines to be quite underwhelming. I miss having a challenge. && Even if I do not particularly enjoy myself in those mines, venturing there reminds me of the various times I accompanied my descendant during missions. #$e# I wonder how he is doing and where he is right now.$7 && Have you heard the voice from over there? I want to know who's there! $1|inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingSummerBeach.000: {{Random: During such a Weather one simply must use the chance and take a dip in the sea. && Recently I learned of an ointment called 'sun screen'.#$e# Want to help me rub it on my back?$3 && The waves of the ocean remind me of a very dear friend I haven't seen in a long time.#$b#...............hm.$7#$e# I think I will listen to the waves a little longer.$7 && I love swimming. Those back muscles didn't build up on their own! $1 && With all due respect, @... #$b# You are standing in the sun. Please move a step or two. $7 |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingBath.000: {{Random: Lovely of you to join me today during this Green Rain, @. && There is nothing better to do in this weather than take a dip in the bath. I don't get why the villagers are so scared.|inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingBath.001: {{Random: I used to be part of tight-knit friend trio.#$b# There were banquets in our realm every now and then and we would often go to the hot springs together afterwards.$1#$e# Hah...#$b# I miss them a lot. Don't tell anyone I said that. $4 && (Pei Ming seems to be zoned out. Best to leave him be before he starts flirting with you again.) $9 |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingBday.000: {{Random: Ah, good morning, @. It is my birthday and I am a little melancholic about it. Please don't mind me. && The view over the valley from here is great but I can't help but miss the view from my old palace.#$e# On my birthday, I would often invite over my closest companions and enjoy freshly brewed tea, sitting at the balcony that overlooked the North together. && %It's Pei Ming's birthday but he seems to be lost in thought. Perhaps even someone like him needs a quiet moment to himself. |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.PeiMingBday.001: {{Random: %Pei Ming is wistfully staring at the water.#$e# (mumbling)... it's been so long since I last saw him. A birthday without him feels shallow.$7 #$e# %Pei Ming doesn't notice your presence. You decide to leave him alone. && Hello, @. I was just reminiscing. #$b#$y 'Have you ever crossed the waters within a coffin?_I'm sorry, what?_Yeah, forget about it.$7_That's a little macabre._Life is macabre, little farmer.$7_Uhm... isn't it your birthday?_....ha. You remembered?$7#$b# Indeed it is. I am not in a festive mood, though. && This birthday in particular causes me to feel quite sad. But maybe you could help me, @?#$b#Why don't we go for a swim together? I just know you look great in swimwear.$3 |inputSeparator= &&}}
